class_notes: Pre-requisite requirement: ENVS 131; ENVS students will be prioritized during pre-registration, students should contact Leah Thomas leah.thomas@emory.edu for a permission number. Non-ENVS should contact Leah Thomas to be considered for any available spots during add/drop/swap.
course_description: Environmental issues that are often misunderstood can be communicated with effective writing and presentation methods. This class provides tools for addressing environmental misconceptions while also developing communication skills for a variety of personal, public, or academic situations.
schedule_location: MW 1pm-2:15pm in Math & Science Center - N301
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3597, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: A. Martin, Status: Closed
